volunteer_experience.info:
The mission of the International Dark-Sky Association (IDA) is to preserve and protect the night-time environment and our heritage of dark skies through environmentally responsible outdoor lighting. IDA works to stop light pollution, cut energy waste, protect humans and wildlife from the carcinogenic and hazardous disruption caused to our circadian rhythm due to light pollution at night. As part of the India Chapter, I run the social media campaign for IDA in the country and work towardsâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          The mission of the International Dark-Sky Association (IDA) is to preserve and protect the night-time environment and our heritage of dark skies through environmentally responsible outdoor lighting. IDA works to stop light pollution, cut energy waste, protect humans and wildlife from the carcinogenic and hazardous disruption caused to our circadian rhythm due to light pollution at night. As part of the India Chapter, I run the social media campaign for IDA in the country and work towards raising awareness on the issues of light pollution and energy conservation. One of only two registered IDA members in India and work directly with the Chapter head.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
